description: Anwar R and Eyad A are accused of committing crimes against humanity for Syria's regime.
title: Syria civil war: Germany holds unprecedented state torture trial
title_page: Syria civil war: Germany holds unprecedented state torture trial - BBC News
maintext: German prosecutors say that Anwar R, 57, was a high-ranking officer in charge of the GID's Al-Khatib prison in the capital Damascus. He is suspected of being involved in the torture of at least 4,000 people in 2011-12, and has been charged with 58 counts of murder as well as rape and sexual assault.
